title: 'His resignation is inevitable!' Keir Starmer skewered as Reform MP calls on 'disastrous' PM to go
tags: Labour MP suffers GB News grilling after declaring 'united support' for Keir Starmer;Ex-Labour adviser tells Keir Starmer WHEN he should resign as pressure mounts on PM;Nigel Farage says Keir Starmer will be gone by end of the month as he sticks boot in: ‘Game’s up!’;The GB News Editorial Charter
